args: I've got my books and my quills.\nNow all I need is...
All ready for yer first day?
Bwaaaa ha ha! Yer almost there now.\nOh, but have ya told all the forest critters\nthat yer gonna be takin' off?
Nooo. Why would I need to?

Yer gonna be busier than a one-legged
man in a butt-kickin' contest, kid!
Ya won't have time to pop in on yer
animal friends whenever ya want.
No! Yer gonna be studyin' in the morning\nand crammin' at night. Life's gonna be\nreal different for ya from now on.
Hey! This whole deal was YER idea!
If ya wanna be an adult, ya gotta suck it\nup and stick to yer word. Ain't always fun,\nbut that's just the way of it.
I don't know what to do.
What's wrong? You look ready to cry.
I can't go to school anymore...\nI don't WANNA go to school anymore!
Okay, what's going on here?\nTalk to me.
Ranzal told me that if I go to school,\nI won't be able to see my forest friends\nevery day like I always have!
But...but it was my bunny friends that\nhelped me learn to like vegetables!
And my bear friend saved me that day\nI got stuck in the tree!
And...and there was that time I played\nhide-and-seek with the deer and got lost...
But the deer was really soft and warm and\nwe took a nap and then the birdie came\nto find us.
I LOVE my forest friends!\nI don't wanna leave them!
You clearly care about them a great deal.
I know. And that's why the thought of\nnever being able to see them is so...
Have you told the animals about this?
Did you tell them how much you care,\nand also why you want to go to school?
Well, why don't you talk to them about it\nand see what they have to say?
They're your friends—I'm sure they'll\nhave a lot of good advice.
I'm sorry for not talking to you all earlier\nabout wanting to go to school.
I mean, I'm happy I get to go—I am.
But knowing I won't be able to see all of\nyou as much makes me not want to do it.
Hmm? What do you want, Mr. Birdie?\n...Eeek! Stop poking me with your beak!
Augh! Why are you all pushing me?!
...Wait. Are you all trying to tell me\nthat I SHOULD go to school?
And that even if we're apart,\nwe'll still be the best of friends?
They want you to follow your heart.
No matter how far apart you are,\nfriends are always connected in spirit.
Awww! *sniff* Lemme give you all a hug!
Okay, I'm gonna go to school—but I'll \ncome see you EVERY chance I get!
Even if we can't play together every day,\nwe'll be friends FOREVER!
The animals of the forest were deep in\nconversation about something...
